record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1915. Fifth row: N. B. Johnson and A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: C. M. Bent, D. R. Powers, R. C. White, S. S. Windrow, P. R. Des Jardien, J. E. Lee, and D. H. Sparks; third row: F. S. Whiting, H. S. Gorgas, C. J. Stout, B. Dismond, and D. J. Fisher; second row: H. J. Stegeman, J. G. Agar, F. T. Ward (captain), R. O. Cornwell, and W. T. Goodwin; first row: L. Campbell, D. Knight, J. W. Breathed, and M. A. Barancik.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Lower right corner of photo damaged
